organizations: Honourable Company of Edinburgh Golfers at Muirfield
lead_paragraph: The Honourable Company of Edinburgh Golfers at Muirfield has a male-only membership, resurrecting the debate that Augusta National put to rest this year.
snippet: The Honourable Company of Edinburgh Golfers at Muirfield has a male-only membership, resurrecting the debate that Augusta National put to rest this year.
